doc.name: point
doc.description: Draw a point on the screen
doc.bottom_description:
Use stroke to set the point's color, and use strokeWeight to set the point's radius.

Setting the color with fill will not affect point

arguments.description: The point
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The point
arguments.name: y

doc.name: beginShape
doc.description: Begin adding vertices to a custom shape
doc.bottom_description: The following would draw a 100 by 100 square at position 100, 100

arguments.description: The opengl shape mode `LINES`, `POINTS`, `QUADS`, `TRIANGLES`, `TRIANGLE_FAN`
arguments.name: mode

doc.name: vertex
doc.description:
beginShape must be called prior
Adding a vertex to a custom shape

arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The y position
arguments.name: y

doc.name: endShape
doc.description:
beginShape must be called prior
